sentences.en: A strong continuity of tradition and custom had guided the redoubtable islanders of the far east across the centuries .
sentences.cn: 传统和习俗的牢固延续，曾经引导这些可畏的远东岛民度过许多世纪。

sentences.en: But Mr. Feng, knew what a redoubtable player the old man was and said nothing.
sentences.cn: 冯先生晓得刘四爷的厉害,没敢接碴儿.

sentences.en: He had never met a more redoubtable fighter.
sentences.cn: 他从未遇见过如此令人敬畏的斗士。

sentences.en: The redoubtable American woman played her part.
sentences.cn: 可敬的美国妇女作出了其贡献。

trans.tran_cn: 可怕的，厉害的，令人敬畏的
trans.tran_en: someone who is redoubtable is a person you respect or fear
